EmbyUpdater.Label: Emby Updater
EmbyUpdater.Description: Sends a message to a Emby server to update the library.

Fields.AccessToken-Help:
An Emby API access token.
Note: Only set this if you want to override the plugin settings access token.
Fields.Mapping-Help:
A list of mapping replacement used to paths in FileFlows with the paths that are used in Emby.
Note: This will not be used unless the Server URL is also set here, otherwise the plugin settings mappings will be used.
Fields.ServerUrl-Help:
The URL of the Emby server.
Note: Only set this if you want to override the plugin settings Server URL.

Outputs.2: Emby update request failed to send

Emby.Description: A plugin that allows you to communicate with Emby.

Fields.Mapping-Help: A list of mapping replacement used to paths in FileFlows with the paths that are used in Emby.
Fields.ServerUrl-Help: The URL of the Emby server
